moves.name: Facade
moves.effect: Its power is doubled when the user is poisoned, badly poisoned, paralyzed, or burned. Ignores lowered Attack from burns.

moves.name: Full Heal
moves.effect: Removes all status conditions from an ally.

moves.name: Apply Yourself!
moves.effect: Increases the move gauges of all allied sync pairs by two. Makes all allied sync pairs gradually heal themselves.

moves.name: Crunch
moves.effect: Has a small chance of lowering the target’s Defense.

syncMove.name: Fundamental Takedown
syncMove.description: Its power increases if the user is affected by a status condition.

passives.name: Outrun 4
passives.description: Quickly charges the move gauge when the Pokémon is affected by a status condition.
